trans-unit.source: Supports the use of non-ASCII characters for Internet domain names.
trans-unit.target: 支援在網際網路網域名稱中使用非 ASCII 字元。

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: 這個類別無法被繼承。

trans-unit.source: An Internet domain name consists of one or more parts, called domain name labels, separated by label separators.
trans-unit.target: 網際網路網域名稱是由一或多個部分，稱為標籤分隔符號所分隔的網域名稱標籤所組成。

trans-unit.source: For example, the domain name "www.proseware.com" consists of the labels, "www", "proseware", and "com", separated by periods.
trans-unit.target: 例如，網域名稱 」 www.proseware.com 」 包含標籤、"www"、"proseware，」 和 「 com 」，以句號分隔。

trans-unit.source: Standard domain names consist of designated characters in the US-ASCII (or Basic Latin) character range, from U+0021 to U+007E.
trans-unit.target: 標準的網域名稱包含在 US ASCII （或基本拉丁文） 字元範圍中，從 U + 0021 U + 007E 至指定的字元。

trans-unit.source: To facilitate Internet usage in cultures that do not use the US-ASCII character set, the Internationalizing Domain Names in Applications (IDNA) standard was adopted in 2003 to support the inclusion of Unicode characters outside the US-ASCII character range.
trans-unit.target: 為了在不使用 US-ASCII 字元組，國際化網域名稱的應用程式 (IDNA) 的文化特性的網際網路使用量 2003 以支援包含 US-ASCII 字元範圍以外的 Unicode 字元的採用標準。

trans-unit.source: However, name servers and domain name resolution continue to rely on characters within the US-ASCII character range.
trans-unit.target: 不過，名稱伺服器和網域名稱解析繼續依賴 US-ASCII 字元範圍內的字元。

trans-unit.source: The IDNA mechanism uses Punycode to map an internationalized domain name that contains Unicode characters outside the US-ASCII character range to the US-ASCII character range supported by the domain name system.
trans-unit.target: IDNA 機制會使用 Punycode 對應國際化的網域名稱包含網域名稱系統所支援的 US-ASCII 字元範圍以 US-ASCII 字元範圍以外的 Unicode 字元。

trans-unit.source: The IDNA mechanism is used to convert only domain names, not data transmitted over the Internet.
trans-unit.target: IDNA 機制用來轉換僅網域名稱，不透過網際網路傳輸的資料。

trans-unit.source: In the [!INCLUDE[net_v45](~/includes/net-v45-md.md)], the <xref:System.Globalization.IdnMapping> class supports different versions of the IDNA standard, depending on the operating system in use:
trans-unit.target: 在[!INCLUDE[net_v45](~/includes/net-v45-md.md)]、<xref:System.Globalization.IdnMapping>類別支援不同版本的 IDNA 標準，根據使用中的作業系統：

trans-unit.source: When run on [!INCLUDE[win8](~/includes/win8-md.md)], it supports the 2008 version of the IDNA standard outlined by [RFC 5891: Internationalized Domain Names in Applications (IDNA): Protocol](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=231875).
trans-unit.target: 在上執行時[!INCLUDE[win8](~/includes/win8-md.md)]，它支援 2008年版的所述的 IDNA 標準[RFC 5891： 國際化網域名稱中的應用程式 (IDNA): 通訊協定](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=231875)。

trans-unit.source: When run on earlier versions of the Windows operating system, it supports the 2003 version of the standard outlined by [RFC 3490: Internationalizing Domain Names in Applications (IDNA)](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=158110).
trans-unit.target: 舊版的 Windows 作業系統上執行時，它支援 2003年版本的所述的標準[RFC 3490： 國際化網域名稱的應用程式 (IDNA)](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=158110)。

trans-unit.source: See [Unicode Technical Standard #46: IDNA Compatibility Processing](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=232459) for the differences in the way these standards handle particular sets of characters.
trans-unit.target: 請參閱[Unicode 的技術標準 #46: IDNA 相容性處理](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=232459)的方式有些差異這些標準處理特定字元集。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Globalization.IdnMapping.GetAscii%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method normalizes a domain name, converts the normalized name to a representation that consists of displayable Unicode characters in the US-ASCII code point range (U+0020 to U+007E), and prepends an ASCII-compatible encoding (ACE) prefix ("xn--") to each label.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Globalization.IdnMapping.GetAscii%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法正規化的網域名稱，將標準化的名稱轉換成在 US-ASCII 字碼指標範圍 (U + 0020 到 U + 007E)，可顯示 Unicode 字元所組成，前面加上 ASCII 相容編碼 (ACE) 前置詞的表示法 ("y2...xn-") 給每一個標籤。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Globalization.IdnMapping.GetUnicode%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method restores the domain name labels converted by the <xref:System.Globalization.IdnMapping.GetAscii%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Globalization.IdnMapping.GetUnicode%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法還原轉換的網域名稱標籤<xref:System.Globalization.IdnMapping.GetAscii%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: If the string to be converted includes the label separator characters IDEOGRAPHIC FULL STOP (U+3002), FULLWIDTH FULL STOP (U+FF0E), and HALFWIDTH IDEOGRAPHIC FULL STOP (U+FF61), the <xref:System.Globalization.IdnMapping.GetAscii%2A> method converts them to the label separator FULL STOP (period, U+002E).
trans-unit.target: 如果要轉換的字串包含標籤分隔符號字元表意完全停止 (U + 3002)，設為全形完全停止 (U + FF0E) 和半形表意完全停止 (U + FF61)<xref:System.Globalization.IdnMapping.GetAscii%2A>方法將它們轉換成標籤分隔符號完全停止 （句號，U +002E)。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Globalization.IdnMapping.GetUnicode%2A> method, however, does not restore the original label separator character.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Globalization.IdnMapping.GetUnicode%2A>方法，不過，不會還原原始標籤分隔字元。

trans-unit.source: The following example uses the <xref:System.Globalization.IdnMapping.GetAscii%28System.String%2CSystem.Int32%2CSystem.Int32%29> method to convert an array of internationalized domain names to Punycode.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會使用<xref:System.Globalization.IdnMapping.GetAscii%28System.String%2CSystem.Int32%2CSystem.Int32%29>方法，將轉換的陣列國際化網域名稱，為 Punycode。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Globalization.IdnMapping.GetUnicode%2A> method then converts the Punycode domain name back to the original domain name, but replaces the original label separators with the standard label separator.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Globalization.IdnMapping.GetUnicode%2A>方法，然後將的 Punycode 網域名稱轉換回原始的網域名稱，但標準標籤分隔字元，取代原始標籤分隔符號。

trans-unit.source: All public methods of <see cref="T:System.Globalization.IdnMapping" /> are thread-safe and may be used concurrently from multiple threads, as long as the <see cref="T:System.Globalization.IdnMapping" /> instance's properties are not also set concurrently.
trans-unit.target: 所有公用方法<see cref="T:System.Globalization.IdnMapping" />是安全執行緒，且可能會同時使用多個執行緒，只要從<see cref="T:System.Globalization.IdnMapping" />執行個體的屬性不也同時設定。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Globalization.IdnMapping" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Globalization.IdnMapping" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Globalization.IdnMapping.AllowUnassigned%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> and <xref:System.Globalization.IdnMapping.UseStd3AsciiRules%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> properties are initialized to `false`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Globalization.IdnMapping.AllowUnassigned%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>和<xref:System.Globalization.IdnMapping.UseStd3AsciiRules%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>屬性會初始化為`false`。

trans-unit.source: A small subset of ASCII characters other than A-Z, 0-9, the hyphen (-) character (U+002D), and the period (.) character are permitted in domain names, but unassigned Unicode code points are not.
trans-unit.target: 一小部分的 ASCII 字元 A-Z、 0-9、 連字號 （-） 以外的字元 (U + 002D)，和網域名稱中允許的句號 （.） 字元，但不是未指定的 Unicode 字碼指標。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether unassigned Unicode code points are used in operations performed by members of the current <see cref="T:System.Globalization.IdnMapping" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指出目前 <see cref="T:System.Globalization.IdnMapping" /> 物件成員執行的作業中是否使用未指定的 Unicode 字碼指標。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if unassigned code points are used in operations; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果作業中使用未指定的字碼指標則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: A registered domain name cannot contain unassigned code points.
trans-unit.target: 已註冊的網域名稱不能包含未指派的字碼指標。

trans-unit.source: Consequently, the default value of the <xref:System.Globalization.IdnMapping.AllowUnassigned%2A> property is `false`.
trans-unit.target: 因此，預設值的<xref:System.Globalization.IdnMapping.AllowUnassigned%2A>屬性是`false`。

trans-unit.source: The IDNA specification permits unassigned code points only in queries for matching strings (that is, in domain name lookup).
trans-unit.target: IDNA 規格允許只在查詢進行比對字串中未指定的字碼指標 (也就是在網域名稱查閱)。

trans-unit.source: For more information about the use of unassigned code points in domain names, see [RFC 3454, "Preparation of Internationalized Strings (stringprep)"](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=231873) and [RFC 5891, "Internationalized Domain Names in Applications (IDNA): Protocol"](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=231875).
trans-unit.target: 如需有關使用網域名稱中未指定的字碼指標，請參閱[RFC 3454、 「 準備的國際化字串 (stringprep) 」](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=231873)和[RFC 5891、"國際化網域名稱中的應用程式 （IDNA): 通訊協定 」](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=231875)。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Globalization.IdnMapping.AllowUnassigned%2A> property is `false`, the behavior associated with the property depends on the underlying operating system.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Globalization.IdnMapping.AllowUnassigned%2A>屬性是`false`，與屬性相關聯的行為取決於基礎作業系統。

trans-unit.source: On [!INCLUDE[win8](~/includes/win8-md.md)], the <xref:System.Globalization.IdnMapping> class conforms to IDNA 2008, which is based on the Unicode 6.0 standard.
trans-unit.target: 在[!INCLUDE[win8](~/includes/win8-md.md)]、<xref:System.Globalization.IdnMapping>類別符合 IDNA 2008，Unicode 6.0 標準為基礎。

trans-unit.source: On previous versions of Windows, the <xref:System.Globalization.IdnMapping> class is based on IDNA 2003, which is based on Unicode 3.*x*.
trans-unit.target: 在舊版的 Windows，<xref:System.Globalization.IdnMapping>類別根據 IDNA 2003，以 Unicode 3 為基礎。*x*。

trans-unit.source: Some code points that were unassigned in IDNA 2003 have been assigned characters and are supported in IDNA 2008.
trans-unit.target: IDNA 2008 中支援和字元已指派給已指派 IDNA 2003 中的一些字碼指標。

trans-unit.source: For example, U+0221 was introduced in Unicode 4.0.
trans-unit.target: 例如，U + 0221年中引進了 Unicode 4.0。

trans-unit.source: On [!INCLUDE[win8](~/includes/win8-md.md)], it is encoded as "xn—6la".
trans-unit.target: 在[!INCLUDE[win8](~/includes/win8-md.md)]，編碼為"y2...xn — 6la"。

trans-unit.source: On previous versions of Windows, it throws an <xref:System.ArgumentException> exception.
trans-unit.target: 舊版 Windows 中，它會擲回<xref:System.ArgumentException>例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: The object to compare to the current object.
trans-unit.target: 要與目前的物件進行比較的物件。

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether a specified object and the current <see cref="T:System.Globalization.IdnMapping" /> object are equal.
trans-unit.target: 指出指定的物件和目前的 <see cref="T:System.Globalization.IdnMapping" /> 物件是否相等。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the object specified by the <paramref name="obj" /> parameter is derived from <see cref="T:System.Globalization.IdnMapping" /> and its <see cref="P:System.Globalization.IdnMapping.AllowUnassigned" /> and <see cref="P:System.Globalization.IdnMapping.UseStd3AsciiRules" /> properties are equal; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <paramref name="obj" /> 參數指定的物件是從 <see cref="T:System.Globalization.IdnMapping" /> 衍生，並且其 <see cref="P:System.Globalization.IdnMapping.AllowUnassigned" /> 和 <see cref="P:System.Globalization.IdnMapping.UseStd3AsciiRules" /> 屬性相等，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Encodes a string of domain name labels that include Unicode characters outside the US-ASCII character range to a string of displayable Unicode characters in the US-ASCII character range (U+0020 to U+007E).
trans-unit.target: 將包含 US-ASCII 字元範圍以外之 Unicode 字元的網域名稱標籤字串，編碼為 US-ASCII 字元範圍 (U+0020 到 U+007E) 中可顯示之 Unicode 字元的字串。

trans-unit.source: The string is formatted according to the IDNA standard.
trans-unit.target: 此字串是依據 IDNA 標準來格式化。

trans-unit.source: The string to convert, which consists of one or more domain name labels delimited with label separators.
trans-unit.target: 要轉換的字串，其包含以標籤分隔符號分隔的一個或多個網域名稱標籤。

trans-unit.source: Encodes a string of domain name labels that consist of Unicode characters to a string of displayable Unicode characters in the US-ASCII character range.
trans-unit.target: 將網域名稱標籤的字串 (包含 Unicode 字元) 編碼為 US-ASCII 字元範圍中可顯示的 Unicode 字元字串。

trans-unit.source: The string is formatted according to the IDNA standard.
trans-unit.target: 此字串是依據 IDNA 標準來格式化。

trans-unit.source: The equivalent of the string specified by the <paramref name="unicode" /> parameter, consisting of displayable Unicode characters in the US-ASCII character range (U+0020 to U+007E) and formatted according to the IDNA standard.
trans-unit.target: 由 <paramref name="unicode" /> 參數指定的字串的對等用法，以 US-ASCII 字元範圍 (U+0020 到 U+007E) 中可顯示的 Unicode 字元組成，並根據 IDNA 標準進行格式化。

trans-unit.source: The `unicode` parameter specifies a string of one or more labels that consist of valid Unicode characters.
trans-unit.target: `unicode`參數指定有效的 Unicode 字元所組成的一或多個標籤的字串。

trans-unit.source: The labels are separated by label separators.
trans-unit.target: 標籤會以分隔符號標籤分隔。

trans-unit.source: The `unicode` parameter cannot begin with a label separator, but it can include and optionally end with a separator.
trans-unit.target: `unicode`參數開頭不可以為標籤分隔符號，但它可以包括以及選擇性地以分隔符號結束。

trans-unit.source: The label separators are FULL STOP (period, U+002E), IDEOGRAPHIC FULL STOP (U+3002), FULLWIDTH FULL STOP (U+FF0E), and HALFWIDTH IDEOGRAPHIC FULL STOP (U+FF61).
trans-unit.target: 標籤分隔符號會完全停止 (週期、 U + 002E)、 表意文字全文停止 (U + 3002)，設為全形完全停止 (U + FF0E) 和半形表意完全停止 (U + FF61)。

trans-unit.source: For example, the domain name "www.adatum.com" consists of the labels, "www", "adatum", and "com", separated by periods.
trans-unit.target: 例如，網域名稱 」 www.adatum.com 」 包含標籤、"www"、"adatum，」 和 「 com 」，以句號分隔。

trans-unit.source: A label cannot contain any of the following characters:
trans-unit.target: 標籤不能包含任何下列字元：

trans-unit.source: Unicode control characters from U+0001 through U+001F, and U+007F.
trans-unit.target: 從 U + 001f 範圍和 U + 007F 到 U + 0001 Unicode 控制字元。

trans-unit.source: Unassigned Unicode characters, if the value of the <xref:System.Globalization.IdnMapping.AllowUnassigned%2A> property is `false`.
trans-unit.target: 如果未指定 Unicode 字元的值<xref:System.Globalization.IdnMapping.AllowUnassigned%2A>屬性是`false`。

trans-unit.source: Non-standard characters in the US-ASCII character range, such as the SPACE (U+0020), EXCLAMATION MARK (U+0021), and LOW LINE (U+005F) characters, if the value of the <xref:System.Globalization.IdnMapping.UseStd3AsciiRules%2A> property is `true`.
trans-unit.target: 非標準字元 US-ASCII 字元範圍，例如空格 (U + 0020) 中驚嘆號標記 (U + 0021)，和低 (U + 005F) 字元，如果值<xref:System.Globalization.IdnMapping.UseStd3AsciiRules%2A>屬性是`true`。

trans-unit.source: Characters that are prohibited by a specific version of the IDNA standard.
trans-unit.target: 特定版本的 IDNA 標準禁止的字元。

trans-unit.source: For more information about prohibited characters, see [RFC 3454: Preparation of Internationalized Strings ("stringprep")](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=231873) for IDNA 2003, and [RFC 5982: The Unicode Code Points and Internationalized Domain Names for Applications](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=231877) for IDNA 2008.
trans-unit.target: 如需禁止的字元的詳細資訊，請參閱[RFC 3454： 準備的國際化字串 ("stringprep 」)](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=231873) IDNA 2003 和[RFC 5982: Unicode 字碼指標和國際化網域名稱應用程式](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=231877)IDNA 2008。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Globalization.IdnMapping.GetAscii%2A> method converts all label separators to FULL STOP (period, U+002E).
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Globalization.IdnMapping.GetAscii%2A>方法會將完全停止 (週期、 U + 002E) 中的所有標籤的分隔符號。

trans-unit.source: If `unicode` contains no characters outside the US-ASCII character range and no characters within the US-ASCII character range are prohibited, the method returns `unicode` unchanged.
trans-unit.target: 如果`unicode`未包含任何外部 US-ASCII 字元會禁止的字元範圍和 US-ASCII 字元範圍內的任何字元，則方法會傳回`unicode`不變。

trans-unit.source: The following example uses the <xref:System.Globalization.IdnMapping.GetAscii%28System.String%29> method to convert an array of internationalized domain names to Punycode, which is an encoded equivalent that consists of characters in the US-ASCII character range.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會使用<xref:System.Globalization.IdnMapping.GetAscii%28System.String%29>方法，將轉換的陣列國際化網域名稱，為 Punycode，這是包含 US-ASCII 字元範圍中的字元的編碼對等用法。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Globalization.IdnMapping.GetUnicode%28System.String%29> method then converts the Punycode domain name back into the original domain name, but replaces the original label separators with the standard label separator.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Globalization.IdnMapping.GetUnicode%28System.String%29>方法再轉換回原始的網域名稱的 Punycode 網域名稱，但標準標籤分隔字元，取代原始標籤分隔符號。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="unicode" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="unicode" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="unicode" /> is invalid based on the <see cref="P:System.Globalization.IdnMapping.AllowUnassigned" /> and <see cref="P:System.Globalization.IdnMapping.UseStd3AsciiRules" /> properties, and the IDNA standard.
trans-unit.target: 根據 <see cref="P:System.Globalization.IdnMapping.AllowUnassigned" /> 和 <see cref="P:System.Globalization.IdnMapping.UseStd3AsciiRules" /> 屬性以及 IDNA 標準，<paramref name="unicode" /> 無效。

trans-unit.source: In the [!INCLUDE[net_v45](~/includes/net-v45-md.md)], the <see cref="T:System.Globalization.IdnMapping" /> class supports different versions of the IDNA standard, depending on the operating system in use:
trans-unit.target: 在[!INCLUDE[net_v45](~/includes/net-v45-md.md)]、<see cref="T:System.Globalization.IdnMapping" />類別支援不同版本的 IDNA 標準，根據使用中的作業系統：

trans-unit.source: When run on [!INCLUDE[win8](~/includes/win8-md.md)], it supports the 2008 version of the IDNA standard outlined by [RFC 5891: Internationalized Domain Names in Applications (IDNA): Protocol](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=231875).
trans-unit.target: 在上執行時[!INCLUDE[win8](~/includes/win8-md.md)]，它支援 2008年版的所述的 IDNA 標準[RFC 5891： 國際化網域名稱中的應用程式 (IDNA): 通訊協定](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=231875)。

trans-unit.source: When run on earlier versions of the Windows operating system, it supports the 2003 version of the standard outlined by [RFC 3490: Internationalizing Domain Names in Applications (IDNA)](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=158110).
trans-unit.target: 舊版的 Windows 作業系統上執行時，它支援 2003年版本的所述的標準[RFC 3490： 國際化網域名稱的應用程式 (IDNA)](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=158110)。

trans-unit.source: See [Unicode Technical Standard #46: IDNA Compatibility Processing](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=232459) for the differences in the way these standards handle particular sets of characters.
trans-unit.target: 請參閱[Unicode 的技術標準 #46: IDNA 相容性處理](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=232459)的方式有些差異這些標準處理特定字元集。

trans-unit.source: The string to convert, which consists of one or more domain name labels delimited with label separators.
trans-unit.target: 要轉換的字串，其包含以標籤分隔符號分隔的一個或多個網域名稱標籤。

trans-unit.source: A zero-based offset into <c>unicode</c> that specifies the start of the substring to convert.
trans-unit.target: 針對 <c>unicode</c> 以零為起始的位移，指定要轉換的子字串起點。

trans-unit.source: The conversion operation continues to the end of the <c>unicode</c> string.
trans-unit.target: 轉換作業會持續到 <c>unicode</c> 字串尾端。

trans-unit.source: Encodes a substring of domain name labels that include Unicode characters outside the US-ASCII character range.
trans-unit.target: 將包含 US-ASCII 字元範圍以外之 Unicode 字元的網域名稱標籤子字串編碼。

trans-unit.source: The substring is converted to a string of displayable Unicode characters in the US-ASCII character range and is formatted according to the IDNA standard.
trans-unit.target: 子字串會轉換成 US-ASCII 字元範圍中可顯示的 Unicode 字元，並根據 IDNA 標準進行格式化。

trans-unit.source: The equivalent of the substring specified by the <paramref name="unicode" /> and <paramref name="index" /> parameters, consisting of displayable Unicode characters in the US-ASCII character range (U+0020 to U+007E) and formatted according to the IDNA standard.
trans-unit.target: 由 <paramref name="unicode" /> 和 <paramref name="index" /> 參數指定的子字串的對等用法，以 US-ASCII 字元範圍 (U+0020 到 U+007E) 中可顯示的 Unicode 字元組成，並根據 IDNA 標準進行格式化。

trans-unit.source: The `unicode` and `index` parameters define a substring with one or more labels that consist of valid Unicode characters.
trans-unit.target: `unicode`和`index`參數定義具有有效的 Unicode 字元所組成的一或多個標籤的子字串。

trans-unit.source: The labels are separated by label separators.
trans-unit.target: 標籤會以分隔符號標籤分隔。

trans-unit.source: The first character of the substring cannot begin with a label separator, but it can include and optionally end with a separator.
trans-unit.target: 子字串的第一個字元不能以標籤分隔字元開頭，但它可以包括以及選擇性地以分隔符號結束。

trans-unit.source: The label separators are FULL STOP (period, U+002E), IDEOGRAPHIC FULL STOP (U+3002), FULLWIDTH FULL STOP (U+FF0E), and HALFWIDTH IDEOGRAPHIC FULL STOP (U+FF61).
trans-unit.target: 標籤分隔符號會完全停止 (週期、 U + 002E)、 表意文字全文停止 (U + 3002)，設為全形完全停止 (U + FF0E) 和半形表意完全停止 (U + FF61)。

trans-unit.source: For example, the domain name "www.adatum.com" consists of the labels, "www", "adatum", and "com", separated by periods.
trans-unit.target: 例如，網域名稱 」 www.adatum.com 」 包含標籤、"www"、"adatum，」 和 「 com 」，以句號分隔。

trans-unit.source: A label cannot contain any of the following characters:
trans-unit.target: 標籤不能包含任何下列字元：

trans-unit.source: Unicode control characters from U+0001 through U+001F, and U+007F.
trans-unit.target: 從 U + 001f 範圍和 U + 007F 到 U + 0001 Unicode 控制字元。

trans-unit.source: Unassigned Unicode characters, depending on the value of the <xref:System.Globalization.IdnMapping.AllowUnassigned%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 未指派的值而定的 Unicode 字元，<xref:System.Globalization.IdnMapping.AllowUnassigned%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: Non-standard characters in the US-ASCII character range, such as the SPACE (U+0020), EXCLAMATION MARK (U+0021), and LOW LINE (U+005F) characters, depending on the value of the <xref:System.Globalization.IdnMapping.UseStd3AsciiRules%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 非標準字元 US-ASCII 字元範圍，例如空格 (U + 0020) 中驚嘆號標記 (U + 0021)，和低列 (U + 005F) 字元，根據的值<xref:System.Globalization.IdnMapping.UseStd3AsciiRules%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: Characters that are prohibited by a specific version of the IDNA standard.
trans-unit.target: 特定版本的 IDNA 標準禁止的字元。

trans-unit.source: For more information about prohibited characters, see [RFC 3454: Preparation of Internationalized Strings ("stringprep")](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=231873) for IDNA 2003, and [RFC 5982: The Unicode Code Points and Internationalized Domain Names for Applications](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=231877) for IDNA 2008.
trans-unit.target: 如需禁止的字元的詳細資訊，請參閱[RFC 3454： 準備的國際化字串 ("stringprep 」)](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=231873) IDNA 2003 和[RFC 5982: Unicode 字碼指標和國際化網域名稱應用程式](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=231877)IDNA 2008。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Globalization.IdnMapping.GetAscii%2A> method converts all label separators to FULL STOP (period, U+002E).
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Globalization.IdnMapping.GetAscii%2A>方法會將完全停止 (週期、 U + 002E) 中的所有標籤的分隔符號。

trans-unit.source: If `unicode` contains no characters outside the US-ASCII character range and no characters within the US-ASCII character range are prohibited, the method returns `unicode` unchanged.
trans-unit.target: 如果`unicode`未包含任何外部 US-ASCII 字元會禁止的字元範圍和 US-ASCII 字元範圍內的任何字元，則方法會傳回`unicode`不變。

trans-unit.source: The following example removes the local part and the @ character from an email address, and passes the resulting domain name to the <xref:System.Globalization.IdnMapping.GetAscii%28System.String%2CSystem.Int32%29> method to create a Punycode domain name, which is an encoded equivalent that consists of characters in the US-ASCII character range.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會移除本機的組件和 @ 字元從電子郵件地址，並傳遞產生的網域名稱，以<xref:System.Globalization.IdnMapping.GetAscii%28System.String%2CSystem.Int32%29>方法來建立一個包含 US-ASCII 字元編碼對等的 Punycode 網域名稱字元範圍。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Globalization.IdnMapping.GetUnicode%28System.String%2CSystem.Int32%2CSystem.Int32%29> method then converts the Punycode domain name back into the original domain name, but replaces the original label separators with the standard label separator.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Globalization.IdnMapping.GetUnicode%28System.String%2CSystem.Int32%2CSystem.Int32%29>方法再轉換回原始的網域名稱的 Punycode 網域名稱，但標準標籤分隔字元，取代原始標籤分隔符號。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="unicode" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="unicode" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="index" /> is less than zero.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="index" /> 小於零。

trans-unit.source: -or-
<paramref name="index" /> is greater than the length of <paramref name="unicode" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="index" /> 大於 <paramref name="unicode" /> 的長度。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="unicode" /> is invalid based on the <see cref="P:System.Globalization.IdnMapping.AllowUnassigned" /> and <see cref="P:System.Globalization.IdnMapping.UseStd3AsciiRules" /> properties, and the IDNA standard.
trans-unit.target: 根據 <see cref="P:System.Globalization.IdnMapping.AllowUnassigned" /> 和 <see cref="P:System.Globalization.IdnMapping.UseStd3AsciiRules" /> 屬性以及 IDNA 標準，<paramref name="unicode" /> 無效。

trans-unit.source: In the [!INCLUDE[net_v45](~/includes/net-v45-md.md)], the <see cref="T:System.Globalization.IdnMapping" /> class supports different versions of the IDNA standard, depending on the operating system in use:
trans-unit.target: 在[!INCLUDE[net_v45](~/includes/net-v45-md.md)]、<see cref="T:System.Globalization.IdnMapping" />類別支援不同版本的 IDNA 標準，根據使用中的作業系統：

trans-unit.source: When run on [!INCLUDE[win8](~/includes/win8-md.md)], it supports the 2008 version of the IDNA standard outlined by [RFC 5891: Internationalized Domain Names in Applications (IDNA): Protocol](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=231875).
trans-unit.target: 在上執行時[!INCLUDE[win8](~/includes/win8-md.md)]，它支援 2008年版的所述的 IDNA 標準[RFC 5891： 國際化網域名稱中的應用程式 (IDNA): 通訊協定](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=231875)。

trans-unit.source: When run on earlier versions of the Windows operating system, it supports the 2003 version of the standard outlined by [RFC 3490: Internationalizing Domain Names in Applications (IDNA)](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=158110).
trans-unit.target: 舊版的 Windows 作業系統上執行時，它支援 2003年版本的所述的標準[RFC 3490： 國際化網域名稱的應用程式 (IDNA)](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=158110)。

trans-unit.source: See [Unicode Technical Standard #46: IDNA Compatibility Processing](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=232459) for the differences in the way these standards handle particular sets of characters.
trans-unit.target: 請參閱[Unicode 的技術標準 #46: IDNA 相容性處理](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=232459)的方式有些差異這些標準處理特定字元集。

trans-unit.source: The string to convert, which consists of one or more domain name labels delimited with label separators.
trans-unit.target: 要轉換的字串，其包含以標籤分隔符號分隔的一個或多個網域名稱標籤。

trans-unit.source: A zero-based offset into <c>unicode</c> that specifies the start of the substring.
trans-unit.target: 針對 <c>unicode</c> 以零為起始的位移，指定子字串起點。

trans-unit.source: The number of characters to convert in the substring that starts at the position specified by <c>index</c> in the <c>unicode</c> string.
trans-unit.target: 子字串中要轉換的字元數，此子字串是從 <c>unicode</c> 字串中的 <c>index</c> 所指定的位置開始。

trans-unit.source: Encodes the specified number of characters in a substring of domain name labels that include Unicode characters outside the US-ASCII character range.
trans-unit.target: 在包含 US-ASCII 字元範圍以外之 Unicode 字元的網域名稱標籤子字串中，將指定數目的字元編碼。

trans-unit.source: The substring is converted to a string of displayable Unicode characters in the US-ASCII character range and is formatted according to the IDNA standard.
trans-unit.target: 子字串會轉換成 US-ASCII 字元範圍中可顯示的 Unicode 字元，並根據 IDNA 標準進行格式化。

trans-unit.source: The equivalent of the substring specified by the <paramref name="unicode" />, <paramref name="index" />, and <paramref name="count" /> parameters, consisting of displayable Unicode characters in the US-ASCII character range (U+0020 to U+007E) and formatted according to the IDNA standard.
trans-unit.target: 由 <paramref name="unicode" />、<paramref name="index" /> 和 <paramref name="count" /> 參數指定的子字串對等用法，其包含 US-ASCII 字元範圍 (U+0020 到 U+007E) 中可顯示的 Unicode 字元組成，並根據 IDNA 標準進行格式化。

trans-unit.source: The `Unicode`, `index`, and `count` parameters define a substring with one or more labels that consist of valid Unicode characters.
trans-unit.target: `Unicode`， `index`，和`count`參數定義具有有效的 Unicode 字元所組成的一或多個標籤的子字串。

trans-unit.source: The labels are separated by label separators.
trans-unit.target: 標籤會以分隔符號標籤分隔。

trans-unit.source: The first character of the substring cannot begin with a label separator, but it can include and optionally end with a separator.
trans-unit.target: 子字串的第一個字元不能以標籤分隔字元開頭，但它可以包括以及選擇性地以分隔符號結束。

trans-unit.source: The label separators are FULL STOP (period, U+002E), IDEOGRAPHIC FULL STOP (U+3002), FULLWIDTH FULL STOP (U+FF0E), and HALFWIDTH IDEOGRAPHIC FULL STOP (U+FF61).
trans-unit.target: 標籤分隔符號會完全停止 (週期、 U + 002E)、 表意文字全文停止 (U + 3002)，設為全形完全停止 (U + FF0E) 和半形表意完全停止 (U + FF61)。

trans-unit.source: For example, the domain name "www.adatum.com" consists of the labels, "www", "adatum", and "com", separated by periods.
trans-unit.target: 例如，網域名稱 」 www.adatum.com 」 包含標籤、"www"、"adatum，」 和 「 com 」，以句號分隔。

trans-unit.source: A label cannot contain any of the following characters:
trans-unit.target: 標籤不能包含任何下列字元：

trans-unit.source: Unicode control characters from U+0001 through U+001F, and U+007F.
trans-unit.target: 從 U + 001f 範圍和 U + 007F 到 U + 0001 Unicode 控制字元。

trans-unit.source: Unassigned Unicode characters, depending on the value of the <xref:System.Globalization.IdnMapping.AllowUnassigned%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 未指派的值而定的 Unicode 字元，<xref:System.Globalization.IdnMapping.AllowUnassigned%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: Non-standard characters in the US-ASCII character range, such as the SPACE (U+0020), EXCLAMATION MARK (U+0021), and LOW LINE (U+005F) characters, depending on the value of the <xref:System.Globalization.IdnMapping.UseStd3AsciiRules%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 非標準字元 US-ASCII 字元範圍，例如空格 (U + 0020) 中驚嘆號標記 (U + 0021)，和低列 (U + 005F) 字元，根據的值<xref:System.Globalization.IdnMapping.UseStd3AsciiRules%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: Characters that are prohibited by a specific version of the IDNA standard.
trans-unit.target: 特定版本的 IDNA 標準禁止的字元。

trans-unit.source: For more information about prohibited characters, see [RFC 3454: Preparation of Internationalized Strings ("stringprep")](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=231873) for IDNA 2003, and [RFC 5982: The Unicode Code Points and Internationalized Domain Names for Applications](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=231877) for IDNA 2008.
trans-unit.target: 如需禁止的字元的詳細資訊，請參閱[RFC 3454： 準備的國際化字串 ("stringprep 」)](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=231873) IDNA 2003 和[RFC 5982: Unicode 字碼指標和國際化網域名稱應用程式](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=231877)IDNA 2008。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Globalization.IdnMapping.GetAscii%2A> method converts all label separators to FULL STOP (period, U+002E).
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Globalization.IdnMapping.GetAscii%2A>方法會將完全停止 (週期、 U + 002E) 中的所有標籤的分隔符號。

trans-unit.source: If the substring contains no characters outside the US-ASCII character range, and no characters within the US-ASCII character range are prohibited, the method returns the substring unchanged.
trans-unit.target: 如果子字串未包含 US-ASCII 字元範圍，以外的任何字元，而且禁止使用 US-ASCII 字元範圍內的任何字元，則方法會傳回未變更的子字串。

trans-unit.source: The following example uses the <xref:System.Globalization.IdnMapping.GetAscii%28System.String%2CSystem.Int32%2CSystem.Int32%29> method to convert an internationalized domain name to a domain name that complies with the IDNA standard.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會使用<xref:System.Globalization.IdnMapping.GetAscii%28System.String%2CSystem.Int32%2CSystem.Int32%29>方法，將轉換符合 IDNA 標準的網域名稱使用國際化的網域名稱。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Globalization.IdnMapping.GetUnicode%28System.String%2CSystem.Int32%2CSystem.Int32%29> method then converts the standardized domain name back into the original domain name, but replaces the original label separators with the standard label separator.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Globalization.IdnMapping.GetUnicode%28System.String%2CSystem.Int32%2CSystem.Int32%29>方法，然後將標準化的網域名稱轉換回原始的網域名稱，但標準標籤分隔字元，取代原始標籤分隔符號。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="unicode" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="unicode" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="index" /> or <paramref name="count" /> is less than zero.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="index" /> 或 <paramref name="count" /> 小於零。

trans-unit.source: -or-
<paramref name="index" /> is greater than the length of <paramref name="unicode" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="index" /> 大於 <paramref name="unicode" /> 的長度。

trans-unit.source: -or-
<paramref name="index" /> is greater than the length of <paramref name="unicode" /> minus <paramref name="count" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="index" /> 大於 <paramref name="unicode" /> 減去 <paramref name="count" /> 之後的長度。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="unicode" /> is invalid based on the <see cref="P:System.Globalization.IdnMapping.AllowUnassigned" /> and <see cref="P:System.Globalization.IdnMapping.UseStd3AsciiRules" /> properties, and the IDNA standard.
trans-unit.target: 根據 <see cref="P:System.Globalization.IdnMapping.AllowUnassigned" /> 和 <see cref="P:System.Globalization.IdnMapping.UseStd3AsciiRules" /> 屬性以及 IDNA 標準，<paramref name="unicode" /> 無效。

trans-unit.source: In the [!INCLUDE[net_v45](~/includes/net-v45-md.md)], the <see cref="T:System.Globalization.IdnMapping" /> class supports different versions of the IDNA standard, depending on the operating system in use:
trans-unit.target: 在[!INCLUDE[net_v45](~/includes/net-v45-md.md)]、<see cref="T:System.Globalization.IdnMapping" />類別支援不同版本的 IDNA 標準，根據使用中的作業系統：

trans-unit.source: When run on [!INCLUDE[win8](~/includes/win8-md.md)], it supports the 2008 version of the IDNA standard outlined by [RFC 5891: Internationalized Domain Names in Applications (IDNA): Protocol](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=231875).
trans-unit.target: 在上執行時[!INCLUDE[win8](~/includes/win8-md.md)]，它支援 2008年版的所述的 IDNA 標準[RFC 5891： 國際化網域名稱中的應用程式 (IDNA): 通訊協定](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=231875)。

trans-unit.source: When run on earlier versions of the Windows operating system, it supports the 2003 version of the standard outlined by [RFC 3490: Internationalizing Domain Names in Applications (IDNA)](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=158110).
trans-unit.target: 舊版的 Windows 作業系統上執行時，它支援 2003年版本的所述的標準[RFC 3490： 國際化網域名稱的應用程式 (IDNA)](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=158110)。

trans-unit.source: See [Unicode Technical Standard #46: IDNA Compatibility Processing](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=232459) for the differences in the way these standards handle particular sets of characters.
trans-unit.target: 請參閱[Unicode 的技術標準 #46: IDNA 相容性處理](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=232459)的方式有些差異這些標準處理特定字元集。

trans-unit.source: Returns a hash code for this <see cref="T:System.Globalization.IdnMapping" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 傳回這個 <see cref="T:System.Globalization.IdnMapping" /> 物件的雜湊程式碼。

trans-unit.source: One of four 32-bit signed constants derived from the properties of an <see cref="T:System.Globalization.IdnMapping" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 四個 32 位元帶正負號的常數的其中一個，這些常數是從 <see cref="T:System.Globalization.IdnMapping" /> 物件的屬性衍生。

trans-unit.source: The return value has no special meaning and is not suitable for use in a hash code algorithm.
trans-unit.target: 傳回值沒有特別意義，且不適合在雜湊程式碼演算法中使用。

trans-unit.source: Override the <xref:System.Globalization.IdnMapping.GetHashCode%2A> method if your application needs to implement a meaningful hash code algorithm.
trans-unit.target: 覆寫<xref:System.Globalization.IdnMapping.GetHashCode%2A>方法，如果您的應用程式必須實作的有意義的雜湊程式碼的演算法。

trans-unit.source: The following example assumes that a single string can contain multiple email addresses separated by spaces.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會假設單一字串可以包含多個以空格分隔的電子郵件地址。

trans-unit.source: It removes the local part and the @ character from each email address, and passes the resulting domain name to the <xref:System.Globalization.IdnMapping.GetAscii%28System.String%2CSystem.Int32%29> or <xref:System.Globalization.IdnMapping.GetAscii%28System.String%2CSystem.Int32%2CSystem.Int32%29> method to create a Punycode domain name.
trans-unit.target: 它會移除本機的組件和 @ 字元，從每個電子郵件地址，並將產生的網域名稱，以<xref:System.Globalization.IdnMapping.GetAscii%28System.String%2CSystem.Int32%29>或<xref:System.Globalization.IdnMapping.GetAscii%28System.String%2CSystem.Int32%2CSystem.Int32%29>方法來建立 Punycode 網域名稱。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Globalization.IdnMapping.GetUnicode%28System.String%2CSystem.Int32%2CSystem.Int32%29> method then converts the Punycode domain name back into the original domain name.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Globalization.IdnMapping.GetUnicode%28System.String%2CSystem.Int32%2CSystem.Int32%29>方法再轉換回原始的網域名稱的 Punycode 網域名稱。

trans-unit.source: Decodes one or more domain name labels encoded according to the IDNA standard to a string of Unicode characters.
trans-unit.target: 將一個或多個根據 IDNA 標準編碼的網域名稱標籤解碼為 Unicode 字元的字串。

trans-unit.source: The string to decode, which consists of one or more labels in the US-ASCII character range (U+0020 to U+007E) encoded according to the IDNA standard.
trans-unit.target: 要解碼的字串，其包含 US-ASCII 字元範圍 (U+0020 到 U+007E) 中一個或多個標籤，根據 IDNA 標準編碼。

trans-unit.source: Decodes a string of one or more domain name labels, encoded according to the IDNA standard, to a string of Unicode characters.
trans-unit.target: 將根據 IDNA 標準編碼的一個或多個網域名稱標籤字串解碼為 Unicode 字元字串。

trans-unit.source: The Unicode equivalent of the IDNA substring specified by the <paramref name="ascii" /> parameter.
trans-unit.target: IDNA 子字串的 Unicode 對等用法，由 <paramref name="ascii" /> 參數指定。

trans-unit.source: For more information about domain names, labels, and label separators, see the remarks for the <xref:System.Globalization.IdnMapping.GetAscii%28System.String%2CSystem.Int32%2CSystem.Int32%29?displayProperty=nameWithType> method.
trans-unit.target: 如需網域名稱、 標籤和標籤分隔符號的詳細資訊，請參閱備註<xref:System.Globalization.IdnMapping.GetAscii%28System.String%2CSystem.Int32%2CSystem.Int32%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法。

trans-unit.source: The following example uses the <xref:System.Globalization.IdnMapping.GetAscii%28System.String%29> method to convert an array of internationalized domain names to Punycode.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會使用<xref:System.Globalization.IdnMapping.GetAscii%28System.String%29>方法，將轉換的陣列國際化網域名稱，為 Punycode。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Globalization.IdnMapping.GetUnicode%28System.String%29> method then converts the Punycode domain name back into the original domain name, but replaces the original label separators with the standard label separator.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Globalization.IdnMapping.GetUnicode%28System.String%29>方法再轉換回原始的網域名稱的 Punycode 網域名稱，但標準標籤分隔字元，取代原始標籤分隔符號。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="ascii" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="ascii" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="ascii" /> is invalid based on the <see cref="P:System.Globalization.IdnMapping.AllowUnassigned" /> and <see cref="P:System.Globalization.IdnMapping.UseStd3AsciiRules" /> properties, and the IDNA standard.
trans-unit.target: 根據 <see cref="P:System.Globalization.IdnMapping.AllowUnassigned" /> 和 <see cref="P:System.Globalization.IdnMapping.UseStd3AsciiRules" /> 屬性以及 IDNA 標準，<paramref name="ascii" /> 無效。

trans-unit.source: The string to decode, which consists of one or more labels in the US-ASCII character range (U+0020 to U+007E) encoded according to the IDNA standard.
trans-unit.target: 要解碼的字串，其包含 US-ASCII 字元範圍 (U+0020 到 U+007E) 中一個或多個標籤，根據 IDNA 標準編碼。

trans-unit.source: A zero-based offset into <c>ascii</c> that specifies the start of the substring to decode.
trans-unit.target: 針對 <c>ascii</c> 以零為起始的位移，指定要解碼的子字串起點。

trans-unit.source: The decoding operation continues to the end of the <c>ascii</c> string.
trans-unit.target: 解碼作業會持續到 <c>ascii</c> 字串尾端。

trans-unit.source: Decodes a substring of one or more domain name labels, encoded according to the IDNA standard, to a string of Unicode characters.
trans-unit.target: 將根據 IDNA 標準編碼的一個或多個網域名稱標籤子字串解碼為 Unicode 字元字串。

trans-unit.source: The Unicode equivalent of the IDNA substring specified by the <paramref name="ascii" /> and <paramref name="index" /> parameters.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="ascii" /> 和 <paramref name="index" /> 參數指定 IDNA 子字串的 Unicode 對等用法。

trans-unit.source: For more information about domain names, labels, and label separators, see the remarks for the <xref:System.Globalization.IdnMapping.GetAscii%28System.String%2CSystem.Int32%2CSystem.Int32%29?displayProperty=nameWithType> method.
trans-unit.target: 如需網域名稱、 標籤和標籤分隔符號的詳細資訊，請參閱備註<xref:System.Globalization.IdnMapping.GetAscii%28System.String%2CSystem.Int32%2CSystem.Int32%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="ascii" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="ascii" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="index" /> is less than zero.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="index" /> 小於零。

trans-unit.source: -or-
<paramref name="index" /> is greater than the length of <paramref name="ascii" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="index" /> 大於 <paramref name="ascii" /> 的長度。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="ascii" /> is invalid based on the <see cref="P:System.Globalization.IdnMapping.AllowUnassigned" /> and <see cref="P:System.Globalization.IdnMapping.UseStd3AsciiRules" /> properties, and the IDNA standard.
trans-unit.target: 根據 <see cref="P:System.Globalization.IdnMapping.AllowUnassigned" /> 和 <see cref="P:System.Globalization.IdnMapping.UseStd3AsciiRules" /> 屬性以及 IDNA 標準，<paramref name="ascii" /> 無效。

trans-unit.source: The string to decode, which consists of one or more labels in the US-ASCII character range (U+0020 to U+007E) encoded according to the IDNA standard.
trans-unit.target: 要解碼的字串，其包含 US-ASCII 字元範圍 (U+0020 到 U+007E) 中一個或多個標籤，根據 IDNA 標準編碼。

trans-unit.source: A zero-based offset into <c>ascii</c> that specifies the start of the substring.
trans-unit.target: 針對 <c>ascii</c> 以零起始的位移，指定子字串起點。

trans-unit.source: The number of characters to convert in the substring that starts at the position specified by <c>index</c> in the <c>ascii</c> string.
trans-unit.target: 子字串中要轉換的字元數，此子字串是從 <c>ascii</c> 字串中的 <c>index</c> 所指定的位置開始。

trans-unit.source: Decodes a substring of a specified length that contains one or more domain name labels, encoded according to the IDNA standard, to a string of Unicode characters.
trans-unit.target: 將根據 IDNA 標準編碼的一個或多個網域名稱標籤的指定長度子字串，解碼為 Unicode 字元字串。

trans-unit.source: The Unicode equivalent of the IDNA substring specified by the <paramref name="ascii" />, <paramref name="index" />, and <paramref name="count" /> parameters.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="ascii" />、<paramref name="index" /> 和 <paramref name="count" /> 參數指定 IDNA 子字串的 Unicode 對等用法。

trans-unit.source: For more information about domain names, labels, and label separators, see the remarks for the <xref:System.Globalization.IdnMapping.GetAscii%28System.String%2CSystem.Int32%2CSystem.Int32%29?displayProperty=nameWithType> method.
trans-unit.target: 如需網域名稱、 標籤和標籤分隔符號的詳細資訊，請參閱備註<xref:System.Globalization.IdnMapping.GetAscii%28System.String%2CSystem.Int32%2CSystem.Int32%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="ascii" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="ascii" /> 為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="index" /> or <paramref name="count" /> is less than zero.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="index" /> 或 <paramref name="count" /> 小於零。

trans-unit.source: -or-
<paramref name="index" /> is greater than the length of <paramref name="ascii" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="index" /> 大於 <paramref name="ascii" /> 的長度。

trans-unit.source: -or-
<paramref name="index" /> is greater than the length of <paramref name="ascii" /> minus <paramref name="count" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="index" /> 大於 <paramref name="ascii" /> 減去 <paramref name="count" /> 之後的長度。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="ascii" /> is invalid based on the <see cref="P:System.Globalization.IdnMapping.AllowUnassigned" /> and <see cref="P:System.Globalization.IdnMapping.UseStd3AsciiRules" /> properties, and the IDNA standard.
trans-unit.target: 根據 <see cref="P:System.Globalization.IdnMapping.AllowUnassigned" /> 和 <see cref="P:System.Globalization.IdnMapping.UseStd3AsciiRules" /> 屬性以及 IDNA 標準，<paramref name="ascii" /> 無效。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether standard or relaxed naming conventions are used in operations performed by members of the current <see cref="T:System.Globalization.IdnMapping" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指出目前 <see cref="T:System.Globalization.IdnMapping" /> 物件成員執行的作業中是否使用標準或寬鬆命名慣例。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if standard naming conventions are used in operations; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果作業中使用標準命名慣例，則為 <see langword="true" />，否則為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Domain names that follow standard naming rules consist of a specific subset of characters in the US-ASCII character range.
trans-unit.target: 遵循標準命名規則的網域名稱包含 US-ASCII 字元範圍中的字元的特定子集。

trans-unit.source: The characters are the letters A through Z, the digits 0 through 9, the hyphen (-) character (U+002D), and the period (.) character.
trans-unit.target: 字元是字母 A 到 Z、 0 到 9 的數字、 連字號 （-） 字元 (U + 002D)，以及句號 （.） 字元。

trans-unit.source: The case of the characters is not significant.
trans-unit.target: 字元的大小寫並不重要。

trans-unit.source: Relaxed naming conventions allow the use of a broader range of ASCII characters, including the space character (U+0020), the exclamation point character (U+0021), and the underbar character (U+005F).
trans-unit.target: 比較不嚴謹的命名慣例允許使用更廣泛範圍的 ASCII 字元，包括空格字元 (U + 0020)、 驚嘆號字元 (U + 0021)，和上方橫線字元 (U + 005F)。

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Globalization.IdnMapping.UseStd3AsciiRules%2A> is `true`, only standard characters can appear in a label returned by the <xref:System.Globalization.IdnMapping.GetAscii%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Globalization.IdnMapping.UseStd3AsciiRules%2A>是`true`，標準的字元可出現在所傳回的標籤<xref:System.Globalization.IdnMapping.GetAscii%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: By default, the value of the <xref:System.Globalization.IdnMapping.UseStd3AsciiRules%2A> property is `false`, and an expanded subset of ASCII characters is permitted in a label.
trans-unit.target: 根據預設，值<xref:System.Globalization.IdnMapping.UseStd3AsciiRules%2A>屬性是`false`，並展開的 ASCII 字元子集允許在標籤中。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Globalization.IdnMapping> class prohibits the use of the nondisplayable characters U+0000 through U+001F, and U+007F in domain name labels regardless of the setting of the <xref:System.Globalization.IdnMapping.UseStd3AsciiRules%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Globalization.IdnMapping>類別禁止使用雙位元字元 U + 0000 到 U + 001f 範圍，然後在網域名稱為 U + 007F 標記不論設定為何<xref:System.Globalization.IdnMapping.UseStd3AsciiRules%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: This prohibition reduces the risk of security attacks such as name spoofing.
trans-unit.target: 這項限制可降低受到安全性攻擊，例如名稱詐騙的風險。

trans-unit.source: The following example generates URLs that contain characters in the ASCII range from U+0000 to U+007F and passes them to the <xref:System.Globalization.IdnMapping.GetAscii%28System.String%29> method of two <xref:System.Globalization.IdnMapping> objects.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會產生包含從 U + 0000 到 U + 007F ASCII 範圍中的字元的 Url，並將它們傳遞<xref:System.Globalization.IdnMapping.GetAscii%28System.String%29>方法有兩個<xref:System.Globalization.IdnMapping>物件。

trans-unit.source: One object has its <xref:System.Globalization.IdnMapping.UseStd3AsciiRules%2A> property set to `true`, and the other object has it set to `false`.
trans-unit.target: 一個物件都有其<xref:System.Globalization.IdnMapping.UseStd3AsciiRules%2A>屬性設定為`true`，和另一個物件已將它設定為`false`。

trans-unit.source: The output displays the characters that are invalid when the <xref:System.Globalization.IdnMapping.UseStd3AsciiRules%2A> property is `true` but valid when it is `false`.
trans-unit.target: 輸出會顯示無效字元時<xref:System.Globalization.IdnMapping.UseStd3AsciiRules%2A>屬性是`true`但有效時，它`false`。
